item.title: Make a custom right click menu v2
item.dc:creator: @Tonic Tonic
item.description:
@Tonic wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:5, topic:301063”][quote author=Tonic link=topic=397366.msg2950193#msg2950193 date=1252453243]

Imo, this one sucks in general. If i was to make my own versions of these, i would make it changeable. Kinda like i did for hp bars.

Like the idea
[/quote]
Well when you think, this isnt much code, so you could add 2-3 of these, just changable to the user. I have 4 hp bars on my server, but only 3 are loaded through sprites. So it didnt take the loadtime up but about .2 seconds.[/quote]

That sounds cool .

Read full topic
item.source: Make a custom right click menu v2

item.title: Make a custom right click menu v2
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Tonic, post:4, topic:301063”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=397366.msg2950142#msg2950142 date=1252450579]
Imo, this one sucks in general. If i was to make my own versions of these, i would make it changeable. Kinda like i did for hp bars.
[/quote]

Like the idea[/quote]
Well when you think, this isnt much code, so you could add 2-3 of these, just changable to the user. I have 4 hp bars on my server, but only 3 are loaded through sprites. So it didnt take the loadtime up but about .2 seconds.

Read full topic

item.description:

my message exceeded the length of the characters given
Feministic menu

public final void method40(byte byte0) {
    	int yPos = anInt950; int xPos = anInt949;
			int menuWidth = anInt951;
			int menuHeight = anInt952;
    	Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos, xPos + 2, 0x000000, menuWidth - 4, 1);
    	Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 1, xPos + 1, 0x820082, menuWidth - 2, 1);
    	Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(menuHeight - 2, yPos + 2, xPos, 0xE100E1, menuWidth, 1);
    	Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(menuHeight - 4, yPos + 3, xPos + 1, 0xFF28FF, menuWidth - 2, 1);
    	Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 1, xPos + 3, 0xFF28FF, menuWidth - 6, 1);
    	Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 2, xPos + 3, 0xFF28FF, menuWidth - 6, 1);

    	Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 5, xPos + 2, 0xFF5EFF, menuWidth - 4, 1);
    	Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 6, xPos + 2, 0xFF86FF, menuWidth - 4, 1);

    	Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 10, xPos + 2, 0xFFA4FF, menuWidth - 4, 1);
    	Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 11, xPos + 2, 0xFFA4FF, menuWidth - 4, 1);
    	Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 12, xPos + 2, 0xFFA4FF, menuWidth - 4, 1);
    	Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 13, xPos + 2, 0xFFBBFF, menuWidth - 4, 1);
    	Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 14, xPos + 2, 0xFFBBFF, menuWidth - 4, 1);
    	Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 15, xPos + 2, 0xFFBBFF, menuWidth - 4, 1);
    	Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 16, xPos + 2, 0x989898, menuWidth - 4, 1);
    	Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 17, xPos + 2, 0xa0a0a0, menuWidth - 4, 1);
    	Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 1, xPos + 2, 0xa8a8a8, 1, 1);
    	Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 2, xPos + 1, 0xb0b0b0, 2, 1);
    	Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 1, xPos + menuWidth - 3, 0xb8b8b8, 1, 1);
    	Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 2, xPos + menuWidth - 3, 0xc0c0c0, 2, 1);
    	Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(menuHeight - 21, yPos + 19, xPos + 2, 0xc8c8c8, menuWidth - 4, 1);
    	Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(menuHeight - 23, yPos + 20, xPos + 3, 0xd0d0d0, menuWidth - 6, 1);
    	Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + menuHeight - 1, xPos, 0xd8d8d8, 1, 1);
    	Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + menuHeight - 2, xPos, 0xe0e0e0, 1, 1);
    	Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + menuHeight - 1, xPos + 1, 0xE8e8e8, 1, 1);
    	Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + menuHeight - 3, xPos + 1, 0xf8f8f8, 1, 1);
    	Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + menuHeight - 2, xPos + 1, 0xF8f8f8, 2, 1);
    	Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + menuHeight - 3, xPos + 2, 0xa0a0a0, 1, 1);
    	Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + menuHeight - 1, xPos + menuWidth - 1, 0xFF5EFF, 1, 1);
    	Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + menuHeight - 2, xPos + menuWidth - 1, 0xFF5EFF, 1, 1);
    	Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + menuHeight - 1, xPos + menuWidth - 2, 0xFF5EFF, 1, 1);
    	Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + menuHeight - 3, xPos + menuWidth - 2, 0xFF5EFF, 1, 1);
    	Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + menuHeight - 2, xPos + menuWidth - 3, 0xFF5EFF, 2, 1);
    	Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + menuHeight - 3, xPos + menuWidth - 3, 0xFF5EFF, 1, 1);

		
		
		int mouseX = super.anInt20;
        int mouseY = super.anInt21;
        if (anInt948 == 0) {
        	mouseX -= 4;
        	mouseY -= 4;
        } else if (anInt948 == 1) {
        	mouseX -= 553;
        	mouseY -= 205;
        } else if (anInt948 == 2) {
        	mouseX -= 17;
        	mouseY -= 357;
        }
        aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(true, true, xPos + 3, 0xFFFFFF, "Choose Option", yPos + 14);
    	for (int l1 = 0; l1 < anInt1133; l1++) {
    		int textY = yPos + 31 + (anInt1133 - 1 - l1) * 15;
    		if(aStringArray1199[l1] == null)
    			return;
    		int textColor = 0xFFBBFF;
	       if (mouseX > xPos && mouseX < xPos + menuWidth && mouseY > textY - 11 && mouseY < textY + 5) {
	       	if(aStringArray1199[l1].equalsIgnoreCase("Cancel"))
	       		Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(12, textY - 9, xPos + 3, 0x020002, menuWidth - 6, 1);
	       	else
	       		Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(16, textY - 10, xPos + 3, 0x020002, menuWidth - 6, 1);
	       	textColor = 0xeee5c6;
	       }
	      aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(true, true, xPos + 3, textColor, aStringArray1199[l1], textY + 2);
    	}
    }
